title.narrative: Emergency Humanitarian Response to Nepal earthquake through Rapid Response Facility

description.narrative: This activity (Emergency Humanitarian Response to Nepal earthquake through Rapid Response Facility) is a component of Nepal Earthquake Response 2015 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £27,653,021. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: ActionAid UK, British Red Cross, CANADEM, CARE International UK, CFOA National Resilience Ltd, Crown Agents Limited, Danish Refugee Council, Disasters Emergency Committee, Handicap International (UK), International Organization for Migration (IOM), Mercy Corps Europe, Mission Aviation Fellowship UK, Norwegian Refugee Council, Oxfam GB, RedR, Save the Children UK, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), World Food Programme (WFP). The start date is 27-04-2015 and the end date is 27-04-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
